counter.name: GPU Time Elapsed
counter.description: Time elapsed on the GPU during the measurement.
counter.mdapi_usage_flags: Tier1 Overview System Frame Batch Draw

counter.name: GPU Core Clocks
counter.description: The total number of GPU core clocks elapsed during the measurement.

counter.name: AVG GPU Core Frequency
counter.description: Average GPU Core Frequency in the measurement.
counter.mdapi_usage_flags: Tier1 Overview System Frame Batch Draw

counter.name: GPU Busy
counter.description: Percentage of time in which GPU is not idle including all GPU engines

counter.name: IA Vertex
counter.description: Number of vertices in a draw

counter.name: GpGpu Threadgroup Count
counter.description: Number of GPGPU threadgroups dispatched

counter.name: Async GpGpu Threadgroup Count
counter.description: Number of Async GPGPU threadgroups dispatched

counter.name: Rasterizer Sample Output
counter.description: Number of lit samples emitted by Rasterizer

counter.name: Pixel Blend
counter.description: Number of blended pixels written to all render targets

counter.name: Pixel Write
counter.description: Number of pixels written to all render targets

counter.name: PostPS Alpha Test Fail
counter.description: Number of 2x2 that were lit from Rasterizer but failed the alpha test

counter.name: Shader Pix Kill
counter.description: Number of pixels that were lit from Rasterizer but killed by the Pixel Shader

counter.name: L3 Read
counter.description: Number of Device Cache 64B read requests

counter.name: L3 Write
counter.description: Number of Device Cache 64B write requests

counter.name: Command Parser Compute Engine Busy
counter.description: Percentage of time in which there is a context loaded and active on the compute queue

counter.name: Command Parser Render Engine Busy
counter.description: Percentage of time in which there is a context loaded and active on the 3D queue

counter.name: Command Parser Copy Engine Busy
counter.description: Percentage of time in which there is a context loaded and active on the copy queue.

counter.name: Clipper Input Vertex
counter.description: Number of Clipper input vertices

counter.name: Clipper Primitive Cull
counter.description: Number of Clipper early cull primitives

counter.name: Clipper Primitive Far Near Clip
counter.description: Number of primitives clipped by Clipper due to near/far planes

counter.name: Clipper Primitive Output
counter.description: Number of primitives going out of Clipper, must clip plus the trivial accept. Must clip primitives are counted one time only.

counter.name: IA Primitive
counter.description: Number of primitives in a draw

counter.name: Streamout Output Vertex Count
counter.description: Number of vertices written by SOL

counter.name: Stripsfan Object Count
counter.description: Number of objects exiting Stripsfan stage

counter.name: Stripsfan Object Cull
counter.description: Number of simple culled objects in Stripsfan stage

counter.name: Streamout Primitive Write Count
counter.description: Number of objects data written to memory, read from pipe 0 only

counter.name: SLM Bank Conflict Count
counter.description: Number of SLM accesses resulting in a bank conflict

counter.name: Compressor Input
counter.description: Number of 256B writes to compressible surfaces at the input of the compressor

counter.name: Compressor Output
counter.description: Number of 256B writes to compressible surfaces at the output of the compressor

counter.name: TLB Miss
counter.description: Number of misses from all TLBs and all engines

counter.name: Sampler 2x2 Read
counter.description: Number of 2x2 texel block requested from Sampler

counter.name: Sampler Texture Cache Access
counter.description: Number of Sampler L1 requests

counter.name: Sampler Texture Cache Miss
counter.description: Number of Sampler L1 misses

counter.name: URB Read
counter.description: Number of URB reads

counter.name: URB Write
counter.description: Number of URB writes

counter.name: ICache Hit
counter.description: Number of Instruction Cache hits

counter.name: ICache Miss
counter.description: Number of Instruction Cache misses

counter.name: XVE Active
counter.description: Percentage of time in which at least one pipe is active in XVE

counter.name: XVE Inst Executed ALU0 All
counter.description: Number of execution slots taken by instructions executed by ALL threads on ALU0 pipe

counter.name: XVE Inst Executed ALU1 All
counter.description: Number of execution slots taken by instructions executed by ALL threads on ALU1 pipe. Does not include extended math instructions.

counter.name: XVE Inst Executed Send All
counter.description: Number of instruction (GRF) dispatches executed by ALL threads on SEND Pipe

counter.name: XVE Inst Executed ALU0 CS
counter.description: Number of execution slots taken by instructions executed by CS threads on ALU0 pipe

counter.name: XVE Inst Executed ALU0 PS
counter.description: Number of execution slots taken by instructions executed by PS threads on ALU0 pipe

counter.name: XVE Inst Executed ALU0 VS
counter.description: Number of execution slots taken by instructions executed by VS threads on ALU0 pipe

counter.name: XVE Inst Executed ALU1 CS
counter.description: Number of execution slots taken by instructions executed by CS threads on ALU1 pipe. Does not include extended math instructions.

counter.name: XVE Inst Executed ALU1 PS
counter.description: Number of execution slots taken by instructions executed by PS threads on ALU1 pipe. Does not include extended math instructions.

counter.name: XVE Inst Executed ALU1 VS
counter.description: Number of execution slots taken by instructions executed by VS threads on ALU1 pipe. Does not include extended math instructions.

counter.name: XVE Shared Function Access Hold
counter.description: Percentage of time in which XVE requests stalled by Shared Function units

counter.name: RT BVH Cache Miss
counter.description: Number of BVH cache misses

counter.name: RT Input Message Ray Count
counter.description: Number of valid SIMD lanes in the TraceRay message

counter.name: Load Store Cache Hit
counter.description: Number of Load Store Cache hits

counter.name: Load Store Cache Access
counter.description: Number of Load Store Cache accesses

counter.name: XVE Threads Occupancy All
counter.description: Percentage of thread slots occupied by ALL threads
counter.equation: PEC 14 READ 8 UMUL $VectorEngineThreadsCount $VectorEngineTotalCount UMUL UDIV 100 UMUL $GpuCoreClocks FDIV

counter.name: XVE Inst Issued All
counter.description: Number of instructions issued (decoded) to any pipe

counter.name: GPU Memory Byte Read
counter.description: Number of device local memory (HBM, GDDR, LPDDR, etc.) read bytes

counter.name: GPU Memory Byte Write
counter.description: Number of device local memory (HBM, GDDR, LPDDR, etc.) write bytes

counter.name: Load Store Cache Byte Read
counter.description: Number of bytes read out of the Load Store Cache, excluding SLM accesses

counter.name: Load Store Cache Byte Write
counter.description: Number of bytes written to the Load Store Cache, excluding SLM accesses

counter.name: SLM Byte Read
counter.description: Number of bytes read from SLM

counter.name: SLM Byte Write
counter.description: Number of bytes written to SLM

counter.name: GPU Memory Byte Read Rate
counter.description: Device local memory (HBM, GDDR, LPDDR, etc.) read bandwidth

counter.name: GPU Memory Byte Write Rate
counter.description: Device local memory (HBM, GDDR, LPDDR, etc.) write bandwidth

counter.name: XVE Stall
counter.description: Percentage of time in which any thread loaded but not even a single pipe is active in XVE

counter.name: XVE Inst Executed ALU0 All Utilization
counter.description: Percentage of time taken by instructions executed by ALL threads on ALU0 pipe

counter.name: XVE Inst Executed ALU1 All Utilization
counter.description: Percentage of time taken by instructions executed by ALL threads on ALU1 pipe. Does not include extended math instructions.

counter.name: GPU Time Elapsed
counter.description: Time elapsed on the GPU during the measurement.
counter.mdapi_usage_flags: Tier1 Overview System Frame Batch Draw

counter.name: GPU Core Clocks
counter.description: The total number of GPU core clocks elapsed during the measurement.

counter.name: AVG GPU Core Frequency
counter.description: Average GPU Core Frequency in the measurement.
counter.mdapi_usage_flags: Tier1 Overview System Frame Batch Draw

counter.name: GPU Busy
counter.description: Percentage of time in which GPU is not idle including all GPU engines

counter.name: IA Vertex
counter.description: Number of vertices in a draw

counter.name: GpGpu Threadgroup Count
counter.description: Number of GPGPU threadgroups dispatched

counter.name: Async GpGpu Threadgroup Count
counter.description: Number of Async GPGPU threadgroups dispatched

counter.name: Rasterizer Sample Output
counter.description: Number of lit samples emitted by Rasterizer

counter.name: ICache Hit
counter.description: Number of Instruction Cache hits

counter.name: ICache Miss
counter.description: Number of Instruction Cache misses

counter.name: XVE Active
counter.description: Percentage of time in which at least one pipe is active in XVE

counter.name: XVE Inst Executed ALU0 All
counter.description: Number of execution slots taken by instructions executed by ALL threads on ALU0 pipe

counter.name: XVE Inst Executed ALU1 All
counter.description: Number of execution slots taken by instructions executed by ALL threads on ALU1 pipe. Does not include extended math instructions.

counter.name: XVE Inst Executed Send All
counter.description: Number of instruction (GRF) dispatches executed by ALL threads on SEND Pipe

counter.name: XVE Inst Issued All
counter.description: Number of instructions issued (decoded) to any pipe

counter.name: XVE Shared Function Access Hold
counter.description: Percentage of time in which XVE requests stalled by Shared Function units

counter.name: XVE Stall
counter.description: Percentage of time in which any thread loaded but not even a single pipe is active in XVE

counter.name: XVE Threads Occupancy All
counter.description: Percentage of thread slots occupied by ALL threads
counter.equation: PEC 8 READ 8 UMUL $VectorEngineThreadsCount $VectorEngineTotalCount UMUL UDIV 100 UMUL $GpuCoreClocks FDIV

counter.name: XVE Inst Executed ALU2 All
counter.description: Number of execution slots taken by instructions executed in ALU2 pipe

counter.name: XVE Multiple Pipe Active
counter.description: Percentage of time in which at least two pipes are actively executing a Gen ISA instruction among ALU0, ALU1 and ALU2 pipes

counter.name: Load Store Cache Partial Write Count
counter.description: Number of writes to the Load Store Cache that don't fill a subsector

counter.name: SLM Bank Conflict Count
counter.description: Number of SLM accesses resulting in a bank conflict

counter.name: SLM Byte Read
counter.description: Number of bytes read from SLM

counter.name: SLM Byte Write
counter.description: Number of bytes written to SLM

counter.name: Load Store Cache Byte Read
counter.description: Number of bytes read out of the Load Store Cache, excluding SLM accesses

counter.name: Load Store Cache Byte Write
counter.description: Number of bytes written to the Load Store Cache, excluding SLM accesses

counter.name: Load Store Cache Access
counter.description: Number of Load Store Cache accesses

counter.name: Load Store Cache Hit
counter.description: Number of Load Store Cache hits

counter.name: L3 Atomic Access
counter.description: Number of atomic accesses to Device Cache bank

counter.name: L3 Hit
counter.description: Number of Device Cache accesses which hits in the Device Cache cache

counter.name: L3 Miss
counter.description: Number of Device Cache accesses which miss in the Device Cache cache

counter.name: L3 Read
counter.description: Number of Device Cache 64B read requests

counter.name: L3 Write
counter.description: Number of Device Cache 64B write requests

counter.name: Compressor Input
counter.description: Number of 256B writes to compressible surfaces at the input of the compressor

counter.name: Compressor Output
counter.description: Number of 256B writes to compressible surfaces at the output of the compressor

counter.name: GPU Memory Byte Read
counter.description: Number of device local memory (HBM, GDDR, LPDDR, etc.) read bytes

counter.name: GPU Memory Byte Write
counter.description: Number of device local memory (HBM, GDDR, LPDDR, etc.) write bytes

counter.name: GPU Memory Byte Read Rate
counter.description: Device local memory (HBM, GDDR, LPDDR, etc.) read bandwidth

counter.name: GPU Memory Byte Write Rate
counter.description: Device local memory (HBM, GDDR, LPDDR, etc.) write bandwidth

counter.name: GPU Memory L3 Read
counter.description: Number of GTI memory reads from Device Cache caused by Device Cache misses

counter.name: GPU Memory L3 Write
counter.description: Number of GTI memory writes from Device Cache caused by Device Cache invalidations

counter.name: TLB Miss
counter.description: Number of misses from all TLBs and all engines

counter.name: Async GpGpu Thread Exit Count
counter.description: Number of Async GPGPU EOT messages received

counter.name: GpGpu Dispatch
counter.description: Percentage of time in which spent dispatching GPGPU threads to XVEs

counter.name: Command Parser Compute Engine Busy
counter.description: Percentage of time in which there is a context loaded and active on the compute queue

counter.name: Command Parser Compute Engine Dispatch Kernel Count
counter.description: Number of compute walker commands parsed on the compute engine

counter.name: Command Parser Copy Engine Busy
counter.description: Percentage of time in which there is a context loaded and active on the copy queue.

counter.name: Command Parser Flush Count
counter.description: Number of Stalling flushes at the top of the pipe

counter.name: Command Parser Render Engine Busy
counter.description: Percentage of time in which there is a context loaded and active on the 3D queue

counter.name: Command Parser Render Engine Dispatch Kernel Count
counter.description: Number of compute walker commands parsed on the 3D engine

counter.name: XVE Pipe ALU0 And ALU1 Active
counter.description: Percentage of time in which ALU0 and ALU1 pipes are both actively executing a Gen ISA instruction

counter.name: XVE Pipe ALU0 And ALU2 Active
counter.description: Percentage of time in which ALU0 and ALU2 pipes are both actively executing a Gen ISA instruction

counter.name: XVE Inst Executed ALU0 All Utilization
counter.description: Percentage of time taken by instructions executed by ALL threads on ALU0 pipe

counter.name: XVE Inst Executed ALU1 All Utilization
counter.description: Percentage of time taken by instructions executed by ALL threads on ALU1 pipe. Does not include extended math instructions.

counter.name: XVE Inst Executed ALU2 All Utilization
counter.description: Percentage of time taken by instructions executed in ALU2 pipe

counter.name: GPU Time Elapsed
counter.description: Time elapsed on the GPU during the measurement.
counter.mdapi_usage_flags: Tier1 Overview System Frame Batch Draw

counter.name: GPU Core Clocks
counter.description: The total number of GPU core clocks elapsed during the measurement.

counter.name: AVG GPU Core Frequency
counter.description: Average GPU Core Frequency in the measurement.
counter.mdapi_usage_flags: Tier1 Overview System Frame Batch Draw

counter.name: GPU Busy
counter.description: Percentage of time in which GPU is not idle including all GPU engines

counter.name: IA Vertex
counter.description: Number of vertices in a draw

counter.name: GpGpu Threadgroup Count
counter.description: Number of GPGPU threadgroups dispatched

counter.name: Async GpGpu Threadgroup Count
counter.description: Number of Async GPGPU threadgroups dispatched

counter.name: Rasterizer Sample Output
counter.description: Number of lit samples emitted by Rasterizer

counter.name: Early Depth Stencil Test Fail Np
counter.description: Number of non-promoted 2x2 that failed Depth / Stencil before the Pixel Shader that were previously ambiguous at HiZ

counter.name: Early Depth Stencil Test Fail P
counter.description: Number of promoted 2x2 that failed Depth / Stencil that were previously ambiguous at HiZ

counter.name: HiZ Depth Test Ambig Np
counter.description: Number of non-promoted 2x2 that are ambiguous by hierarchical depth test

counter.name: HiZ Depth Test Ambig P
counter.description: Number of promoted 2x2 that are ambiguous by hierarchical depth test

counter.name: HiZ Depth Test Fail Np
counter.description: Number of non-promoted 2x2 that failed the hierarchical depth test

counter.name: HiZ Depth Test Fail P
counter.description: Number of promoted 2x2 that failed the hierarchical depth test

counter.name: HiZ Depth Test Pass P
counter.description: Number of promoted 2x2 passed by hierarchical depth test

counter.name: HiZ Subspan Latency Fifofull
counter.description: Percentage of time in which for which HiZ latency hiding structure full
counter.equation: PEC 42 READ $SliceTotalCount 2 UMUL UDIV 100 UMUL $GpuCoreClocks FDIV

counter.name: IZ Output Ready
counter.description: Percentage of time in which IZ has requests to different clients
counter.equation: PEC 43 READ $SliceTotalCount 2 UMUL UDIV 100 UMUL $GpuCoreClocks FDIV

counter.name: IZ Subspan Latency Fifofull
counter.description: Percentage of time in which for which IZ latency hiding structure full
counter.equation: PEC 44 READ $SliceTotalCount 2 UMUL UDIV 100 UMUL $GpuCoreClocks FDIV

counter.name: PostPS Depth Stencil Test Fail
counter.description: Number of 2x2 that were lit from Rasterizer but failed the depth or stencil test post shader

counter.name: Render Cache Alloc
counter.description: Number of Render Cache allocations

counter.name: Render Cache Hit
counter.description: Number of Render Cache hits

counter.name: Render Cache Read
counter.description: Number of Render Cache reads

counter.name: Render Cache Write
counter.description: Number of Render Cache writes

counter.name: URB Cross Slice Read
counter.description: Number of URB reads occurred from cross slices

counter.name: Pixel 2x2 Lit Post Rasterizer Early Depth
counter.description: Number of promoted 2x2 that are lit from Rasterizer

counter.name: Pixel 2x2 Lit Post Rasterizer Late Depth
counter.description: Number of non-promoted 2x2 that are lit from Rasterizer

counter.name: GPU Time Elapsed
counter.description: Time elapsed on the GPU during the measurement.
counter.mdapi_usage_flags: Tier1 Overview System Frame Batch Draw

counter.name: GPU Core Clocks
counter.description: The total number of GPU core clocks elapsed during the measurement.

counter.name: AVG GPU Core Frequency
counter.description: Average GPU Core Frequency in the measurement.

counter.name: GPU Busy
counter.description: Percentage of time in which GPU is not idle including all GPU engines

counter.name: IA Vertex
counter.description: Number of vertices in a draw

counter.name: GpGpu Threadgroup Count
counter.description: Number of GPGPU threadgroups dispatched

counter.name: Async GpGpu Threadgroup Count
counter.description: Number of Async GPGPU threadgroups dispatched

counter.name: Rasterizer Sample Output
counter.description: Number of lit samples emitted by Rasterizer

counter.name: AMFS L3 Access
counter.description: Number of AMFS access to Device Cache

counter.name: AMFS L3 Atomic
counter.description: Number of AMFS atomics to Device Cache

counter.name: AMFS L3 Hit
counter.description: Number of AMFS hits in Device Cache

counter.name: AMFS L3 Write
counter.description: Number of AMFS writes to Device Cache

counter.name: Color L3 Access
counter.description: Number of Device Cache requests resulting from color local cache misses

counter.name: Color L3 Hit
counter.description: Number of Device Cache requests resulting from color local cache miss which hits in Device Cache

counter.name: ICache L3 Hit
counter.description: Number of XVE instruction cache requests that hit the Device Cache

counter.name: ICache L3 Read
counter.description: Number of Device Cache read requests coming from XVE Instruction Cache

counter.name: Load Store Cache L3 Hit
counter.description: Number of Load Store Cache requests to Device Cache that are hit

counter.name: Load Store Cache L3 Read
counter.description: Number of cacheline read requests from the Load Store Cache to Device Cache

counter.name: Load Store Cache L3 Write
counter.description: Number of cacheline write requests from the Load Store Cache to Device Cache

counter.name: Sampler L3 Hit
counter.description: Number of Device Cache hit requests resulting from sampler local cache miss which hits in Device Cache

counter.name: Sampler L3 Read
counter.description: Number of Device Cache read requests resulting from sampler local cache miss

counter.name: Z L3 Access
counter.description: Number of Device Cache requests resulting from Z local cache misses

counter.name: Z L3 Hit
counter.description: Number of Device Cache requests resulting from Z local cache miss which hits in Device Cache

counter.name: L3 Atomic Access
counter.description: Number of atomic accesses to Device Cache bank

counter.name: L3 Hit
counter.description: Number of Device Cache accesses which hits in the Device Cache cache

counter.name: L3 Miss
counter.description: Number of Device Cache accesses which miss in the Device Cache cache

counter.name: L3 Read
counter.description: Number of Device Cache 64B read requests

counter.name: L3 Write
counter.description: Number of Device Cache 64B write requests

counter.name: GPU Memory L3 Read
counter.description: Number of GTI memory reads from Device Cache caused by Device Cache misses

counter.name: GPU Memory L3 Write
counter.description: Number of GTI memory writes from Device Cache caused by Device Cache invalidations

counter.name: GPU Memory Read
counter.description: Number of GTI memory reads

counter.name: GPU Memory Write
counter.description: Number of GTI memory writes

counter.name: GPU Time Elapsed
counter.description: Time elapsed on the GPU during the measurement.
counter.mdapi_usage_flags: Tier1 Overview System Frame Batch Draw

counter.name: GPU Core Clocks
counter.description: The total number of GPU core clocks elapsed during the measurement.

counter.name: AVG GPU Core Frequency
counter.description: Average GPU Core Frequency in the measurement.
counter.mdapi_usage_flags: Tier1 Overview System Frame Batch Draw

counter.name: GPU Busy
counter.description: Percentage of time in which GPU is not idle including all GPU engines

counter.name: IA Vertex
counter.description: Number of vertices in a draw

counter.name: GpGpu Threadgroup Count
counter.description: Number of GPGPU threadgroups dispatched

counter.name: Async GpGpu Threadgroup Count
counter.description: Number of Async GPGPU threadgroups dispatched

counter.name: Rasterizer Sample Output
counter.description: Number of lit samples emitted by Rasterizer

counter.name: Compressor Input
counter.description: Number of 256B writes to compressible surfaces at the input of the compressor

counter.name: Compressor Output
counter.description: Number of 256B writes to compressible surfaces at the output of the compressor

counter.name: GPU Memory 32b Transaction Read
counter.description: Number of device local memory (HBM, GDDR, LPDDR, etc.) reads (32B)

counter.name: GPU Memory 32b Transaction Write
counter.description: Number of device local memory (HBM, GDDR, LPDDR, etc.) writes (32B)

counter.name: GPU Memory 64b Transaction Read
counter.description: Number of device local memory (HBM, GDDR, LPDDR, etc.) reads (64B)

counter.name: GPU Memory 64b Transaction Write
counter.description: Number of device local memory (HBM, GDDR, LPDDR, etc.) writes (64B)

counter.name: GPU Memory Byte Read
counter.description: Number of device local memory (HBM, GDDR, LPDDR, etc.) read bytes

counter.name: GPU Memory Byte Write
counter.description: Number of device local memory (HBM, GDDR, LPDDR, etc.) write bytes

counter.name: GPU Memory Byte Read Rate
counter.description: Device local memory (HBM, GDDR, LPDDR, etc.) read bandwidth

counter.name: GPU Memory Byte Write Rate
counter.description: Device local memory (HBM, GDDR, LPDDR, etc.) write bandwidth

counter.name: GPU Memory L3 Read
counter.description: Number of GTI memory reads from Device Cache caused by Device Cache misses

counter.name: GPU Memory L3 Write
counter.description: Number of GTI memory writes from Device Cache caused by Device Cache invalidations

counter.name: TLB Miss
counter.description: Number of misses from all TLBs and all engines

counter.name: L3 Atomic Access
counter.description: Number of atomic accesses to Device Cache bank

counter.name: L3 Hit
counter.description: Number of Device Cache accesses which hits in the Device Cache cache

counter.name: L3 Miss
counter.description: Number of Device Cache accesses which miss in the Device Cache cache

counter.name: L3 Read
counter.description: Number of Device Cache 64B read requests

counter.name: L3 Write
counter.description: Number of Device Cache 64B write requests

counter.name: Load Store Cache Access
counter.description: Number of Load Store Cache accesses

counter.name: Load Store Cache Byte Read
counter.description: Number of bytes read out of the Load Store Cache, excluding SLM accesses

counter.name: Load Store Cache Byte Write
counter.description: Number of bytes written to the Load Store Cache, excluding SLM accesses

counter.name: Load Store Cache Hit
counter.description: Number of Load Store Cache hits

counter.name: Load Store Cache Input Available
counter.description: Percentage of time in which the Load Store Cache has input available

counter.name: Load Store Cache Number Of Bank Access Count
counter.description: Number of Load Store Cache banks accessed in a clock

counter.name: Load Store Cache Output Ready
counter.description: Percentage of time in which the Load Store Cache has output ready

counter.name: Load Store Cache Partial Write Count
counter.description: Number of writes to the Load Store Cache that don't fill a subsector

counter.name: SLM Access Count
counter.description: Number of SLM accesses

counter.name: SLM Bank Conflict Count
counter.description: Number of SLM accesses resulting in a bank conflict

counter.name: SLM Byte Read
counter.description: Number of bytes read from SLM

counter.name: SLM Byte Write
counter.description: Number of bytes written to SLM

counter.name: XVE Load Store Cache Atomic Message Count
counter.description: Number of atomic operations sent by XVEs to the Load Store Cache

counter.name: XVE Load Store Cache Fence Message Count
counter.description: Number of fence messages sent by XVEs to the Load Store Cache

counter.name: XVE Load Store Cache Read Message Count
counter.description: Number of read messages sent by XVEs to the Load Store Cache

counter.name: XVE Load Store Cache Register Request Count
counter.description: Number of message payload transactions sent by XVEs to the Load Store Cache

counter.name: XVE Load Store Cache Register Response Count
counter.description: Number of message payload transactions sent from the Load Store Cache back to XVEs

counter.name: XVE Load Store Cache Write Message Count
counter.description: Number of write messages sent by XVEs to the Load Store Cache

counter.name: XVE SLM Atomic Message Count
counter.description: Number of SLM atomic operations sent by XVEs

counter.name: XVE SLM Fence Message Count
counter.description: Number of SLM fence operations sent by XVEs

counter.name: XVE SLM Read Message Count
counter.description: Number of SLM read messages sent by XVEs

counter.name: XVE SLM Write Message Count
counter.description: Number of SLM write messages sent by XVEs

counter.name: Copy Engine Read Request
counter.description: Number of read requests sent by the Copy Engine

counter.name: Copy Engine Request Stall
counter.description: Percentage of time in which copy engine is stalled on the memory path due to stall on the read or write path when there are commands pending within copy engine

counter.name: Copy Engine Write Request
counter.description: Number of write requests sent by the Copy Engine

counter.name: GPU Time Elapsed
counter.description: Time elapsed on the GPU during the measurement.
counter.mdapi_usage_flags: Tier1 Overview System Frame Batch Draw

counter.name: GPU Core Clocks
counter.description: The total number of GPU core clocks elapsed during the measurement.

counter.name: AVG GPU Core Frequency
counter.description: Average GPU Core Frequency in the measurement.
counter.mdapi_usage_flags: Tier1 Overview System Frame Batch Draw

counter.name: GPU Busy
counter.description: Percentage of time in which GPU is not idle including all GPU engines

counter.name: IA Vertex
counter.description: Number of vertices in a draw

counter.name: GpGpu Threadgroup Count
counter.description: Number of GPGPU threadgroups dispatched

counter.name: Async GpGpu Threadgroup Count
counter.description: Number of Async GPGPU threadgroups dispatched

counter.name: Rasterizer Sample Output
counter.description: Number of lit samples emitted by Rasterizer

counter.name: Clipper Input Available
counter.description: Percentage of time in which Clipper has input available (from Vertex Shader or SOL)

counter.name: Clipper Output Ready
counter.description: Percentage of time in which Clipper output ready

counter.name: Clipper Transaction Output
counter.description: Number of elements pushed by Clipper into Stripsfan stage

counter.name: Streamout Primitive Storage Need
counter.description: Number of objects data that needed beyond the current allocated space, read from pipe 0 only

counter.name: Stripsfan Output Ready
counter.description: Percentage of time in which in which geometry pipeline output is ready

counter.name: Vertex Fetch Input Available
counter.description: Percentage of time in which Vertex Fetch input is available

counter.name: Vertex Fetch Output Ready
counter.description: Percentage of time in which Vertex Fetch output is ready

counter.name: VS Output Ready
counter.description: Percentage of time in which Vertex Shader output is ready

counter.name: Color Pipe Cache Latency1 Stall
counter.description: Percentage of time in which Color Pipeline stalled due to MultiSampling Cache latency hiding structure full
counter.equation: PEC 43 READ $SliceTotalCount 2 UMUL UDIV 100 UMUL $GpuCoreClocks FDIV

counter.name: Color Pipe Cache Latency2 Stall
counter.description: Percentage of time in which Color Pipeline stalled due to Render Cache latency hiding structure full

counter.name: Pixel Post Process Input Available
counter.description: Percentage of time in which Color Pipeline input ready
counter.equation: PEC 45 READ $SliceTotalCount 2 UMUL UDIV 100 UMUL $GpuCoreClocks FDIV

counter.name: Pixel Post Process Output Ready
counter.description: Percentage of time in which Color Pipeline pixel output ready
counter.equation: PEC 46 READ $SliceTotalCount 2 UMUL UDIV 100 UMUL $GpuCoreClocks FDIV

counter.name: PS Output Available
counter.description: Percentage of time in which Pixel Shader data is available

counter.name: AMFS Stall All Input
counter.description: Percentage of time in which AMFS stalls at both of the color pipe inputs

counter.name: AMFS Stall Any Input
counter.description: Percentage of time in which AMFS stalls at any of the color pipe inputs

counter.name: Sampler Active
counter.description: Percentage of time in which Sampler pipeline active

counter.name: Sampler Input Available
counter.description: Percentage of time in which Sampler input is available

counter.name: Sampler Memory Latency Stall
counter.description: Percentage of time in which Sampler stalled due to latency hiding structure full

counter.name: Sampler Output Ready
counter.description: Percentage of time in which Sampler output is ready

counter.name: Rasterizer Input Available
counter.description: Percentage of time in which Rasterizer input is available

counter.name: Rasterizer Output Ready
counter.description: Percentage of time in which where rasterizer output is ready

counter.name: Rasterizer Transaction Output
counter.description: Number of transactions pushed from Rasterizer to the Z pipe

counter.name: Task Thread Exit Count
counter.description: Number of Task Shader EOT messages received

counter.name: Task Threadgroup Count
counter.description: Number of Task Shader threadgroups dispatched

counter.name: Thread Dispatch Input Available
counter.description: Percentage of time in which Thread Dispatch input is available

counter.name: Thread Dispatch PS Active
counter.description: Percentage of time in which Pixel Shader threads are ready for dispatch

counter.name: Thread Dispatch Queue0 Active
counter.description: Percentage of time in which non-Pixel Shader threads are ready for dispatch in a particular Xe core

counter.name: Thread Dispatch Queue0 Stall
counter.description: Percentage of time in which queue 0 is stalled waiting for threads to be available

counter.name: Thread Dispatch Queue1 Active
counter.description: Percentage of time in which non-Pixel Shader threads are ready for dispatch in a particular Xe core

counter.name: Thread Dispatch Queue1 Stall
counter.description: Percentage of time in which queue 1 is stalled waiting for threads to be available

counter.name: Threadgroup Dispatch Queue0 Resource Stall
counter.description: Percentage of time in which Thread Spawner queue 0 is stalled waiting for any resource to be available (for example, SLM, Barrier, BTD stack, etc.)

counter.name: Threadgroup Dispatch Queue1 Resource Stall
counter.description: Percentage of time in which Thread Spawner queue 1 is stalled waiting for any resource to be available (for example, SLM, Barrier, BTD stack, etc.)

counter.name: Command Parser Render Engine Draw Count
counter.description: Number of DRAW and MESH commands parsed on the 3D engine

counter.name: AMFS 4x4 Shading Request
counter.description: Number of Shading Request (evaluate) messages processed by AMFS

counter.name: AMFS Cache Hit
counter.description: Number of hits in the AMFS cache

counter.name: AMFS Cache Miss
counter.description: Number of cache misses in AMFS

counter.name: GPU Time Elapsed
counter.description: Time elapsed on the GPU during the measurement.
counter.mdapi_usage_flags: Tier1 Overview System Frame Batch Draw

counter.name: GPU Core Clocks
counter.description: The total number of GPU core clocks elapsed during the measurement.

counter.name: AVG GPU Core Frequency
counter.description: Average GPU Core Frequency in the measurement.
counter.mdapi_usage_flags: Tier1 Overview System Frame Batch Draw

counter.name: GPU Busy
counter.description: Percentage of time in which GPU is not idle including all GPU engines

counter.name: IA Vertex
counter.description: Number of vertices in a draw

counter.name: GpGpu Threadgroup Count
counter.description: Number of GPGPU threadgroups dispatched

counter.name: Async GpGpu Threadgroup Count
counter.description: Number of Async GPGPU threadgroups dispatched

counter.name: Rasterizer Sample Output
counter.description: Number of lit samples emitted by Rasterizer

counter.name: RT Any Hit Thread Ray Dispatch
counter.description: Number of any hit threads dispatched

counter.name: RT Callable Thread Ray Dispatch
counter.description: Number of callable threads dispatched

counter.name: RT Closest Hit Thread Ray Dispatch
counter.description: Number of closest hit threads dispatched

counter.name: RT Input Message Spawn Count
counter.description: Number of valid SIMD lanes in the Spawn message

counter.name: RT Instance Node Ray Count
counter.description: Number of instance BVH nodes processed by the traversal function

counter.name: RT Internal Node Ray Count
counter.description: Number of internal BVH nodes processed by the traversal function

counter.name: RT Intersection Thread Ray Dispatch
counter.description: Number of intersection threads dispatched

counter.name: RT Message Stall
counter.description: Percentage of time in which Ray Tracing message input is stalled while accepting input

counter.name: RT Miss Thread Ray Dispatch
counter.description: Number of miss threads dispatched

counter.name: RT Procedural Node Ray Count
counter.description: Number of procedural BVH nodes processed by the traversal function

counter.name: RT Quad Leaf Ray Count
counter.description: Number of triangle BVH nodes processed by the traversal function

counter.name: RT Quad Test Ray Count
counter.description: Number of nodes processed that use ray-quad intersection pipeline

counter.name: RT Request Collision
counter.description: Percentage of time in which Ray Tracing Leaf has two Traversal inputs valid

counter.name: RT Transform Ray Count
counter.description: Number of only HW transform accesses

counter.name: RT Traversal Input Ray Count
counter.description: Number of Ray Tracing Traversal input rays

counter.name: RT Traversal Output Ray Count
counter.description: Number of Ray Tracing Traversal output rays

counter.name: RT Traversal Stall
counter.description: Percentage of time in which Ray Tracing Frontend is stalled by Traversal

counter.name: RT Traversal Step Ray Count
counter.description: Number of BVH nodes processed

counter.name: XVE Inst Executed ALU0 RT AHS
counter.description: Number of execution slots taken by instructions executed by RT_AHS threads on ALU0 pipe

counter.name: XVE Inst Executed ALU0 RT CHS
counter.description: Number of execution slots taken by instructions executed by RT_CHS threads on ALU0 pipe

counter.name: XVE Inst Executed ALU0 RT MS
counter.description: Number of execution slots taken by instructions executed by RT_MS threads on ALU0 pipe

counter.name: XVE Inst Executed ALU1 RT AHS
counter.description: Number of execution slots taken by instructions executed by RT_AHS threads on ALU1 pipe. Does not include extended math instructions.

counter.name: XVE Inst Executed ALU1 RT CHS
counter.description: Number of execution slots taken by instructions executed by RT_CHS threads on ALU1 pipe. Does not include extended math instructions.

counter.name: XVE Inst Executed ALU1 RT MS
counter.description: Number of execution slots taken by instructions executed by RT_MS threads on ALU1 pipe. Does not include extended math instructions.

counter.name: XVE Threads Occupancy All
counter.description: Percentage of thread slots occupied by ALL threads
counter.equation: PEC 15 READ 8 UMUL $VectorEngineThreadsCount $VectorEngineTotalCount UMUL UDIV 100 UMUL $GpuCoreClocks FDIV

counter.name: RT BVH Cache Miss
counter.description: Number of BVH cache misses

counter.name: RT Input Message Ray Count
counter.description: Number of valid SIMD lanes in the TraceRay message

counter.name: RT Load Store Cache Read Message Count
counter.description: Number of read messages sent from Ray Tracing unit to the Load Store Cache

counter.name: RT Load Store Cache Write From Message Count
counter.description: Number of write messages sent from Ray Tracing unit to the Load Store Cache

counter.name: GPU Time Elapsed
counter.description: Time elapsed on the GPU during the measurement.
counter.mdapi_usage_flags: Tier1 Overview System Frame Batch Draw

counter.name: GPU Core Clocks
counter.description: The total number of GPU core clocks elapsed during the measurement.

counter.name: AVG GPU Core Frequency
counter.description: Average GPU Core Frequency in the measurement.
counter.mdapi_usage_flags: Tier1 Overview System Frame Batch Draw

counter.name: GPU Busy
counter.description: Percentage of time in which GPU is not idle including all GPU engines

counter.name: IA Vertex
counter.description: Number of vertices in a draw

counter.name: GpGpu Threadgroup Count
counter.description: Number of GPGPU threadgroups dispatched

counter.name: Async GpGpu Threadgroup Count
counter.description: Number of Async GPGPU threadgroups dispatched

counter.name: Rasterizer Sample Output
counter.description: Number of lit samples emitted by Rasterizer

counter.name: ICache Hit
counter.description: Number of Instruction Cache hits

counter.name: ICache Miss
counter.description: Number of Instruction Cache misses

counter.name: XVE Active
counter.description: Percentage of time in which at least one pipe is active in XVE

counter.name: XVE Inst Executed ALU0 All
counter.description: Number of execution slots taken by instructions executed by ALL threads on ALU0 pipe

counter.name: XVE Inst Executed ALU1 All
counter.description: Number of execution slots taken by instructions executed by ALL threads on ALU1 pipe. Does not include extended math instructions.

counter.name: XVE Inst Executed ALU2 All
counter.description: Number of execution slots taken by instructions executed in ALU2 pipe

counter.name: XVE Inst Executed Barrier
counter.description: Number of sync.bar and sync.host instructions executed

counter.name: XVE Inst Executed Bitconv
counter.description: Number of execution slots taken by bit manipulation instructions

counter.name: XVE Inst Executed Control All
counter.description: Number of instructions executed on JEU Pipe

counter.name: XVE Inst Executed Fp16
counter.description: Number of execution slots taken by FP16 ALU instructions. Does not include extended math instructions.

counter.name: XVE Inst Executed Fp32
counter.description: Number of execution slots taken by FP32 ALU instructions. Does not include extended math instructions.

counter.name: XVE Inst Executed Fp64
counter.description: Number of execution slots taken by FP64 ALU instructions

counter.name: XVE Inst Executed Fp64 2nd
counter.description: Number of execution slots taken by FP64 ALU instructions executed in the second pipe

counter.name: XVE Inst Executed Int16
counter.description: Number of execution slots taken by INT16 ALU instructions

counter.name: XVE Inst Executed Int32
counter.description: Number of execution slots taken by INT32 ALU instructions

counter.name: XVE Inst Executed Int64
counter.description: Number of execution slots taken by INT64 instructions

counter.name: XVE Inst Executed Math
counter.description: Number of execution slots taken by extended math instructions

counter.name: XVE Inst Executed Nondivergent
counter.description: Number of non-divergent instructions (not execution slots) executed

counter.name: XVE Inst Executed Predication
counter.description: Number of instructions (not execution slots) executed with predication mask enabled

counter.name: XVE Inst Executed Send All
counter.description: Number of instruction (GRF) dispatches executed by ALL threads on SEND Pipe

counter.name: XVE Inst Executed XMX Bf16
counter.description: Number of execution slots taken by BF16 XMX instructions

counter.name: XVE Inst Executed XMX Fp16
counter.description: Number of execution slots taken by FP16 XMX instructions

counter.name: XVE Inst Executed XMX Int2
counter.description: Number of execution slots taken by INT2 XMX instructions

counter.name: XVE Inst Executed XMX Int4
counter.description: Number of execution slots taken by INT4 XMX instructions

counter.name: XVE Inst Executed XMX Int8
counter.description: Number of execution slots taken by INT8 XMX instructions

counter.name: XVE Inst Issued All
counter.description: Number of instructions issued (decoded) to any pipe

counter.name: XVE Multiple Pipe Active
counter.description: Percentage of time in which at least two pipes are actively executing a Gen ISA instruction among ALU0, ALU1 and ALU2 pipes

counter.name: XVE Pipe ALU0 And ALU1 Active
counter.description: Percentage of time in which ALU0 and ALU1 pipes are both actively executing a Gen ISA instruction

counter.name: XVE Pipe ALU0 And ALU2 Active
counter.description: Percentage of time in which ALU0 and ALU2 pipes are both actively executing a Gen ISA instruction

counter.name: XVE Threads Occupancy All
counter.description: Percentage of thread slots occupied by ALL threads
counter.equation: PEC 20 READ 8 UMUL $VectorEngineThreadsCount $VectorEngineTotalCount UMUL UDIV 100 UMUL $GpuCoreClocks FDIV

counter.name: L3 Atomic Access
counter.description: Number of atomic accesses to Device Cache bank

counter.name: L3 Hit
counter.description: Number of Device Cache accesses which hits in the Device Cache cache

counter.name: L3 Miss
counter.description: Number of Device Cache accesses which miss in the Device Cache cache

counter.name: L3 Read
counter.description: Number of Device Cache 64B read requests

counter.name: L3 Write
counter.description: Number of Device Cache 64B write requests

counter.name: Command Parser Compute Engine Busy
counter.description: Percentage of time in which there is a context loaded and active on the compute queue

counter.name: Command Parser Compute Engine Dispatch Kernel Count
counter.description: Number of compute walker commands parsed on the compute engine

counter.name: Command Parser Render Engine Busy
counter.description: Percentage of time in which there is a context loaded and active on the 3D queue

counter.name: Command Parser Render Engine Dispatch Kernel Count
counter.description: Number of compute walker commands parsed on the 3D engine

counter.name: Compressor Input
counter.description: Number of 256B writes to compressible surfaces at the input of the compressor

counter.name: Compressor Output
counter.description: Number of 256B writes to compressible surfaces at the output of the compressor

counter.name: GPU Memory Byte Read
counter.description: Number of device local memory (HBM, GDDR, LPDDR, etc.) read bytes

counter.name: GPU Memory Byte Write
counter.description: Number of device local memory (HBM, GDDR, LPDDR, etc.) write bytes

counter.name: GPU Memory Byte Read Rate
counter.description: Device local memory (HBM, GDDR, LPDDR, etc.) read bandwidth

counter.name: GPU Memory Byte Write Rate
counter.description: Device local memory (HBM, GDDR, LPDDR, etc.) write bandwidth

counter.name: TLB Miss
counter.description: Number of misses from all TLBs and all engines

counter.name: GPU Time Elapsed
counter.description: Time elapsed on the GPU during the measurement.
counter.mdapi_usage_flags: Tier1 Overview System Frame Batch Draw

counter.name: GPU Core Clocks
counter.description: The total number of GPU core clocks elapsed during the measurement.

counter.name: AVG GPU Core Frequency
counter.description: Average GPU Core Frequency in the measurement.
counter.mdapi_usage_flags: Tier1 Overview System Frame Batch Draw

counter.name: GPU Busy
counter.description: Percentage of time in which GPU is not idle including all GPU engines

counter.name: IA Vertex
counter.description: Number of vertices in a draw

counter.name: GpGpu Threadgroup Count
counter.description: Number of GPGPU threadgroups dispatched

counter.name: Async GpGpu Threadgroup Count
counter.description: Number of Async GPGPU threadgroups dispatched

counter.name: Rasterizer Sample Output
counter.description: Number of lit samples emitted by Rasterizer

counter.name: XVE Stall Aluwr
counter.description: Percentage of time in which XVE stalled, with at least one thread waiting for ALU to write GRF/ACC register. Multiple stall reasons can qualify during the same cycle

counter.name: XVE Stall Barrier
counter.description: Percentage of time in which XVE stalled, with at least one thread waiting for Gateway to write Notify register. Multiple stall reasons can qualify during the same cycle

counter.name: XVE Stall Control
counter.description: Percentage of time in which XVE stalled, with at least one thread waiting for JEU to complete branch instruction. Multiple stall reasons can qualify during the same cycle

counter.name: XVE Stall Instfetch
counter.description: Percentage of time in which XVE stalled, with at least one thread waiting for Instruction Fetch. Multiple stall reasons can qualify during the same cycle

counter.name: XVE Stall Other
counter.description: Percentage of time in which XVE stalled, with at least one thread waiting on any other dependency (Flag/EoT etc). Multiple stall reasons can qualify during the same cycle

counter.name: XVE Stall Pipestall
counter.description: Percentage of time in which XVE stalled, with at least one thread ready to be scheduled (Grf conf/send holds etc). Multiple stall reasons can qualify during the same cycle

counter.name: XVE Stall PS Dependency
counter.description: Percentage of time in which XVE stalled, with at least one thread waiting on Pixel Shader dependency

counter.name: XVE Stall Sbid
counter.description: Percentage of time in which XVE stalled, with at least one thread waiting for Scoreboard token to be available. Multiple stall reasons can qualify during the same cycle

counter.name: XVE Stall Sendwr
counter.description: Percentage of time in which XVE stalled, with at least one thread waiting for SEND message to be dispatched from XVE. Multiple stall reasons can qualify during the same cycle

counter.name: Thread Dispatch Queue0 Active
counter.description: Percentage of time in which non-Pixel Shader threads are ready for dispatch in a particular Xe core

counter.name: Thread Dispatch Queue0 Stall
counter.description: Percentage of time in which queue 0 is stalled waiting for threads to be available

counter.name: Thread Dispatch Queue1 Active
counter.description: Percentage of time in which non-Pixel Shader threads are ready for dispatch in a particular Xe core

counter.name: Thread Dispatch Queue1 Stall
counter.description: Percentage of time in which queue 1 is stalled waiting for threads to be available

counter.name: Threadgroup Dispatch Queue0 Resource Stall
counter.description: Percentage of time in which Thread Spawner queue 0 is stalled waiting for any resource to be available (for example, SLM, Barrier, BTD stack, etc.)

counter.name: Threadgroup Dispatch Queue1 Resource Stall
counter.description: Percentage of time in which Thread Spawner queue 1 is stalled waiting for any resource to be available (for example, SLM, Barrier, BTD stack, etc.)

counter.name: XVE Active
counter.description: Percentage of time in which at least one pipe is active in XVE

counter.name: XVE Shared Function Access Hold
counter.description: Percentage of time in which XVE requests stalled by Shared Function units

counter.name: XVE Stall
counter.description: Percentage of time in which any thread loaded but not even a single pipe is active in XVE

counter.name: XVE Threads Occupancy All
counter.description: Percentage of thread slots occupied by ALL threads
counter.equation: PEC 9 READ 8 UMUL $VectorEngineThreadsCount $VectorEngineTotalCount UMUL UDIV 100 UMUL $GpuCoreClocks FDIV

counter.name: XVE Multiple Pipe Active
counter.description: Percentage of time in which at least two pipes are actively executing a Gen ISA instruction among ALU0, ALU1 and ALU2 pipes

counter.name: XVE Pipe ALU0 And ALU1 Active
counter.description: Percentage of time in which ALU0 and ALU1 pipes are both actively executing a Gen ISA instruction

counter.name: XVE Pipe ALU0 And ALU2 Active
counter.description: Percentage of time in which ALU0 and ALU2 pipes are both actively executing a Gen ISA instruction
